mapper.sql: from sales_order_info I join meta_data_business B on I.company_code = B.company_code join shipping S on S.order_code = I.order_code join sales_order_product P on P.order_code = I.order_code left join meta_data_product M on M.product_code = P.product_code
group by I.order_code, B.name, I.order_date, I.request_date, S.ship_status, S.scheduled_date
mapper.select:
select I.order_code , B.name AS company_name ,I.request_date ,I.order_date, S.ship_status, S.scheduled_date
where I.sales_status = 'accept' and S.ship_code IS NULL
order by I.request_date ASC
select product_status from sales_order_product where order_code =#{order_code}

select P.sales_code, M.name, P.sales_quantity, P.product_status, P.processing_reg
where P.order_code = #{order_code}

select I.order_code , B.name AS company_name ,I.request_date ,I.order_date, S.ship_status , S.scheduled_date
and I.sales_status = 'accept' and S.ship_code IS NULL
select user_pw from employees where user_id = #{user_id}
select order_code from shipping where scheduled_date = #{scheduled_date}
select I.order_date, I.request_date, S.scheduled_date , S.ship_date from sales_order_info I join shipping S on I.order_code = S.order_code where I.order_code = #{order_code}

select I.request_date, E.user_id, E.user_name, E.user_department, E.user_position, E.user_auth, B.company_code, B.name, B.address, B.call from employees E join sales_order_info I on E.user_id = I.user_id join meta_data_business B on B.company_code = I.company_code where I.order_code = #{order_code}
select count(ship_status) from shipping where ship_status = #{ship_status} and ship_code is null

select I.order_code , B.name AS company_name ,I.request_date ,I.order_date, S.ship_status, S.scheduled_date
where I.sales_status = 'accept' and S.ship_status =#{ship_status} and S.ship_code IS NULL
order by I.request_date ASC
mapper.update: update shipping set ship_code = concat_ws('-',(select code_group from common_code where code_group_name='출하'),order_code,DATE_FORMAT(ship_date, '%Y%m%d')), instruction_date = now(), progress_status = 'waiting' where order_code = #{order_code}
mapper.select: select scheduled_date from shipping where order_code=#{order_code}

select S.ship_code, S.order_code, S.ship_date, S.progress_status, I.order_date, B.name as company_name
where S.ship_code is not null and I.sales_status = 'accept' and S.progress_status NOT IN ('complete')

select S.ship_code, S.order_code, S.ship_date, S.progress_status, I.order_date, B.name as company_name
where S.ship_code is not null and I.sales_status = 'accept' and I.user_id = #{user_id} and S.progress_status NOT IN ('complete')

select S.ship_code, S.order_code, S.ship_date, S.progress_status, I.order_date, B.name as company_name
where S.ship_code is not null and I.sales_status = 'accept' and S.progress_status = #{progress_status} and S.progress_status NOT IN ('complete')

select P.sales_code, P.sales_quantity, P.processing_reg, P.order_code, M.name from sales_order_product P left join meta_data_product M on P.product_code = M.product_code where order_code =#{order_code}

select S.ship_code, S.order_code, S.ship_date, S.progress_status, I.order_date, B.name as company_name
and S.ship_code is not null and I.sales_status = 'accept' and S.progress_status NOT IN ('complete')
